search.query: index=_internal | stats sparkline(sum(count)) as overtime| eval text="42"

search.query: index=_internal | stats sparkline(sum(count)) as overtime | eval v =81
index=_internal|dedup index | eval title = "Orders"| table title date_second
index=_internal | stats sparkline(sum(count)) as overtime | eval v =81
index=_internal | stats sparkline(sum(count)) as overtime | eval v = 100
index=_internal | stats sparkline(count) as overtime count as total by sourcetype | head 7 |eval text = coalesce(text, total) | streamstats count as count

| makeresults | eval total="5", sourcetype="Text value check", text="Happy" | append [| makeresults | eval total="2", sourcetype="This is a very long name
will wrap " ] | append [| makeresults | eval total="100", text="", sourcetype="Icon test"] |eval text = coalesce(text, total) | table sourcetype total text
index=_internal | stats sparkline(count) as overtime count as total by sourcetype | head 3 |eval text = coalesce(text, total)
